item.title: How to contact Kate Gallego : Phoenix Mayor
item.dc:creator: Expert
item.category: How do i contact Kate Gallego
item.description:
Contact Phoenix Mayor Kate Gallego by Email To contact Kate Gallego by email, you can send an email message to mayor.gallego@phoenix.gov or you can email Kate Gallego at her personal email address info@kategallego.com How to Contact Kate Gallego by phone You can contact Mayor Kate Gallego by telephone at 602-262-7111 or you can call Kate Gallego … Continue reading →

The post How to contact Kate Gallego : Phoenix Mayor appeared first on How To Do Stuff.
item.content:encoded:
Contact Phoenix Mayor Kate Gallego by Email

To contact Kate Gallego by email, you can send an email message to mayor.gallego@phoenix.gov or you can email Kate Gallego at her personal email address info@kategallego.com

How to Contact Kate Gallego by phone

You can contact Mayor Kate Gallego by telephone at 602-262-7111 or you can call Kate Gallego on her personal phone number 480-249-5178.

Kate Gallego mailing address

You can contact Kate Gallego on below address:

Kate Gallego for Phoenix Mayor

530 E McDowell Rd #107-460

Phoenix, AZ 85004

About Kate Gallego

Katharine S. Gallego is an American politician serving as the mayor of Phoenix, Arizona since 2019. A member of the Democratic Party, she previously served on the Phoenix City Council from 2014 to 2018. She has spent her career working to find solutions to complex problems. Kate’s record of results includes leading the campaign to pass Phoenix’s citywide transportation plan through 2050 and working to ensure equal pay for equal work. Since being elected to Phoenix City Council in 2013 and elected Mayor in 2019, Kate has helped make Phoenix a leader in job creation and has worked to bring manufacturing, healthcare, and high-paying jobs to Phoenix.

Assumed office March 21, 2019
Preceded by Thelda Williams

Personal details
Born
Katharine Sarah Widland

October 21, 1981
Albuquerque, New Mexico, U.S.
Political party Democratic
Spouse(s)
Ruben Gallego
(m. 2010; div. 2017)​
Children 1
Education Harvard University (BA)
University of Pennsylvania (MBA)

Education

Kate Gallego grew up in Albuquerque, New Mexico. Her parents are attorneys who moved to Albuquerque from Chicago after the 1979 Chicago blizzard. She grew up with asthma, which made air quality important to her.

Kate Gallego graduated from Albuquerque Academy, where she served as student body vice president. She earned a bachelor’s degree in environmental studies from Harvard College and a Master of Business Administration from the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania.

Kate Gallego on social media

You can contact or tweet to Kate Gallego on twitter by following Kate Gallego on Twitter page.

About Phoenix City, Arizona

Phoenix is the 5th largest city in the United States. It is a vibrant, growing city and a great place to live, work, and play!

Also read: How to contact Elon Musk : Tesla Motors CEO

The post How to contact Kate Gallego : Phoenix Mayor appeared first on How To Do Stuff.

item.description:

The post How to Contact Sonu Sood for financial help / Mobile Helpline/ Whatsapp No / Instagram, FB, Twitter appeared first on How To Do Stuff.
item.content:encoded:
Contact Sonu Sood For Medical Help and Whatsapp Number Details with Mobile Helpline number and Personal Contact Number with Social Media Accounts on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Website

Sonu Sood Contact Number, Whatsapp Helpline No 2022, COVID 19 Assistance, Official Website, Sood Charity Foundation

Sonu Sood Contact details for financial help, job search help, COVID or other help & Toll-free Helpline, Whatsapp number information can be accessed in this article. Popular actor Sonu Sood and his team is helping people of India in these bad times. Here you will find details of Helpline toll-free numbers & WhatsApp contact numbers shared by the Sonu Sood  & team.

How to Contact Sonu Sood for Help using Charity Foundation Website

Sonu Sood helps the needy people through his Charity Foundation, named Sood Charity Foundation. The foundation does not accept any money or help. This tells a lot about the Character of this Real-life Hero. You may visit the Sood Charity website https://soodcharityfoundation.org/. In this portal, you will get the detailed information regarding various help offerings along with the contact information. For contacting the sood charity foundation by email, you can send it to supportus@soodcharityfoundation.org.

Contact Sonu Sood by directly call phone number

Sonu Sood is trying to help as much as possible people in these bad times. So don’t expect to find Sonu Sood’s personal contact number anywhere online. There are various helpline numbers active and few WhatsApp support lines too. You may contact the Sonu Sood team through his official website and send an email to the official email address.

How to Approach Sonu Sood for Job seeker / Help using Toll-Free Helpline Number

Sonu Sood is active on the different online and offline mediums to help the people in needy. He has initiated a Toll-Free Helpline Number to Contact him for help. Sonu Sood has been launched a helpline number 1800 121 664422  for the job seekers searching for the job during the pandemic.

Sonu Sood Helpline Numbers

Helpline Numbers:  1800 121 664422 or 9321472118. On mobile number, please send SMS or Whatsapp message only.

Pediatric heart surgeries Helpline number: 02067083686.

Contact Sonu Sood for help on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Whatsapp

This article guides you to contact Sonu Sood for Help using the Mobile Helpline Number, Website, Personal Social Media Accounts like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Whatsapp.

Sonu Sood’s Facebook account

Sonu Sood’s Twitter account

Sonu Sood’s Instagram account

Contact Sonu Sood through Whatsapp Number:

Recently in a tweet Sonu sood mentioned a whatsapp number 9321472118. You may send your query via whatsapp chat on this number. This is not personal number of the actor and it has been specifically mentioned to send your queries by message only, please do not call.

Sood Charity Foundation IAS registration/apply for online coaching

Sood Charity Foundation’s SAMBHAVAM is a unique program for aspirants of IAS (Civil Services). It is a quality coaching facility to needy aspirants at top civil services institutes of India. The candidates can apply for the Sonu Sood free IAS Coaching Scholarship by clicking here.

Sood Charity Foundation Free CA Education Internship / Coaching

To become a Chartered Accountant is a milestone to achieve in ones life. Realizing the need to foster inclusive education, Sood Charity Foundation has joined hands with WIRC of ICAI, Media Chutney to launch a one of it’s kind initiative – SAKSHAM. It aims to empower aspiring students by providing support with education and other facets of becoming a Chartered Accountant. To apply for free CA internship, click here.

Also Read : How to contact Elon Musk : Tesla Motors CEO

The post How to Contact Sonu Sood for financial help / Mobile Helpline/ Whatsapp No / Instagram, FB, Twitter appeared first on How To Do Stuff.

The post How to contact Elon Musk directly – email address, phone number appeared first on How To Do Stuff.
item.content:encoded:
Want to contact Elon Musk directly ? How to contact elon musk with an idea ? How can i email Elon Musk directly ? Can i contact Elon Musk personally ?

Get Elon Musk’s email, Elon Musk’s personal mailing address, agent, manager & publicity contact details.

Let’s see Elon Musk’s contact information including business email address, phone number, mailing address,  personal email and more. 

Elon Musk’s Contact Information / How to contact Elon Musk directly / personally

To contact Elon Musk, write a letter that’s addressed to him and send it to Corporate Secretary, Tesla, Inc. 3500 Deer Creek Road, Palo Alto, CA 94304 United States. You can also reach out to Elon Musk over Twitter by using his Twitter handle @elonmusk.

 Contact Elon Musk at his Official Site (Books | SpaceX | Tesla | Merchandise | Tequila), Instagram (SpaceX | Tesla), LinkedIn (Tesla Motors | SpaceX),  Twitter (SpaceX | Tesla) & YouTube (SpaceX | Tesla).

Beside this, how to contact elon musk for an interview ? how do I contact Elon Musk by email?

Elon Musk’s Email

  1. @spacex.com.
  2. @solarcity.com.
  3. @gmail.com.
  4. @teslamotors.com.
  5. @yahoo.com.

One may also ask, what kind of phone does Elon Musk use? Musk uses his own phone that was designed by General Electronics and Tesla.

 How do I email Elon Musk?

Elon Musk’s personal email address is unknown.

 What is Elon Musk’s mailing address?

To contact Elon Musk, write a letter that’s addressed to him and send it to Corporate Secretary, Tesla, Inc. 3500 Deer Creek Road, Palo Alto, CA 94304 United States. You can also reach out to Elon Musk over Twitter by using his Twitter handle @elonmusk.

 How do I message Elon Musk directly?

Message Elon Musk directly on his Official Site (Books | SpaceX | Tesla | Merchandise | Tequila), Instagram (SpaceX | Tesla), LinkedIn (Tesla Motors | SpaceX),  Twitter (SpaceX | Tesla) & YouTube (SpaceX | Tesla).

 

 How do I call Elon Musk?

Elon Musk’s personal phone number is unknown.

 How do I meet Elon Musk in person?

Meet Elon Musk personally at one of his live events.

 What is Elon Musk’s Facebook page?

Elon Musk is not on Facebook. In a New York Times interview, he told journalist Maureen Dowd, “I’m not like, pro-Facebook. I don’t have a Facebook page. SpaceX and Tesla deleted their Facebook pages. I think [Mark] Zuckerberg and Sheryl Sandberg still have a lot of work to do to restore public trust in Facebook itself.”

 What is Elon Musk’s Instagram profile?

Elon Musk is not on Instagram. In a New York Times interview with journalist Maureen Dowd, he said, “I deleted my Instagram. Technically, I have a secret account. It’s only to see links of things that people send me. SpaceX and Tesla do have an Instagram.”

🅻 What is Elon Musk’s LinkedIn profile?

Elon Musk is not on LinkedIn, but Tesla Motors & SpaceX are: Tesla Motors on Linkedin & SpaceX on Linkedin.

 What is Elon Musk’s Snapchat account?

Elon Musk is not on Snapchat.

 What is Elon Musk’s TikTok profile?

Elon Musk is not on TikTok.

 What is Elon Musk’s Twitter account?

Elon Musk’s Twitter account is https://twitter.com/elonmusk.

 What is Elon Musk’s YouTube channel?

Elon Musk’s YouTube channel is Elon Musk on Youtube.

Elon Musk’s Email Address

  • emusk@spacex.com

Elon Musk’s personal email address is unknown.

Elon Musk Companies’ Mailing Addresses

Elon Musk
c/o Tesla Motors
3500 Deer Creek
Palo Alto, CA 94304

Elon Musk
c/o SpaceX
Rocket Rd.
Hawthorne, CA 90250

Elon Musk’s Phone Number

Elon Musk’s personal phone number is unknown. Call his agent, manager, & publicist.

Elon Musk’s Facebook Account

Elon Musk is not on Instagram. In a New York Times interview with journalist Maureen Dowd, he said, “I deleted my Instagram. Technically, I have a secret account. It’s only to see links of things that people send me. SpaceX and Tesla do have an Instagram.”

Elon Musk’s Twitter Account

Elon Musks’s Twitter accounts are:

  • Elon Musk (@elonmusk)
  • SpaceX (@spacex)
  • Tesla (@tesla)

Elon Musk’s Home Addresses

Elon Musk’s home address is not fully available but as per latest news, he has moved to Texas.

How to Contact Sonu Sood for help

How do I contact Musk Foundation?

CONTACT: Musk Foundation, 11075 Santa Monica Blvd., Ste. 150, Los Angeles, CA 90025, 310-473-7575.

 

Summary
 Name  Elon Reeve Musk
 Nickname  Elon
 Birth date  28 June 1971
 Birth place  Pretoria, South Africa
 Education  University of Pennsylvania (BS & BA; 1997)
 Occupation  Entrepreneur, industrial designer, engineer
 Parents  Errol Musk (father)
Maye Musk (mother)
 Website  https://tesla.com/
 Job Title  Business Person
 Company  Tesla Motors
 Address  3500 Deer Creek,
Palo Alto, CA, 94304
